author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Stay and Fly Free to Six Senses Con DaoTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Stay and Fly Free to Six Senses Con Dao
Six Senses Con Dao introduces its most convenient offer, ever: free domestic flights for stays of three nights or longer! A savings of USD 210 per person, the resort will also include overnight accommodation with transfers in Ho Chi Minh City through October 31, 2016 .
Stay for three nights or longer at breathtaking Six Senses Con Dao and the resort will include free round-trip flights* between Ho Chi Minh City and Con Dao, with fast tracking and VIP lounge at Tan Son Nhat Domestic Airport plus airport transfers to and from the resort. If necessary, we’ve included hotel accommodation in Ho Chi Minh City the evening prior to departure to Con Dao*, with airport transfers. Guests will enjoy welcome amenities plus daily buffet breakfast at By the Beach restaurant, access to the weekly complimentary wellness activities and on-site activities, unlimited in-villa WiFi access, complimentary non-motorized water sports and children’s club activities.
